CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high V oc of 0.91 V compared to the linear NDT - TPD - based copolymer PNDTTPD with a PCE of 4.0% and a V oc of 0.69 V. 15 Meanwhile , high - performance p-channel fieldeffect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

1. In the sentence "14 The polymer solar cells (PSCs) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high Voc of 0.91 V...", the material names are:
- Polymer solar cells (PSCs)
- PzNDTTPD (donor)
- [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) (acceptor)

2. In the sentence "15 Meanwhile, high-performance p-channel field-effect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm2 V-1 s-1 and an on/off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.", the material name is:
- High-performance p-channel field-effect transistors

Please note that "high-performance" is a property rather than a material name.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. In the sentence "14 The polymer solar cells (PSCs) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high Voc of 0.91 V...", the material names are:
- PSCs (polymer solar cells)
- PzNDTTPD (donor)
- PC71BM (acceptor)

2. In the sentence "15 Meanwhile, high-performance p-channel field-effect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm2 V-1 s-1 and an on/off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.", the material name is:
- p-channel field-effect transistors

I have removed the irrelevant entities and only kept the entities that clearly refer to Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSCs (polymer solar cells) |
| PzNDTTPD (donor) |
| PC71BM (acceptor) |
| p-channel field-effect transistors |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high V oc of 0.91 V compared to the linear NDT - TPD - based copolymer PNDTTPD with a PCE of 4.0% and a V oc of 0.69 V. 15 Meanwhile , high - performance p-channel fieldeffect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polymer solar cells (PSCs)
2. PzNDTTPD (donor in PSCs)
3. [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM, acceptor in PSCs)
4. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
5. Voc (Open-Circuit Voltage)
6. NDT-TPD (a copolymer)
7. p-channel field-effect transistors
8. Hole mobility
9. On/off current ratio

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are either materials, parameters, or devices that have specific properties or values associated with them.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. Voc (Open-Circuit Voltage)
3. Hole mobility

These are the "Material Property" entities in the given paragraph. They are properties that describe the performance or characteristics of materials or devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| Voc |
| Hole mobility |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high V oc of 0.91 V compared to the linear NDT - TPD - based copolymer PNDTTPD with a PCE of 4.0% and a V oc of 0.69 V. 15 Meanwhile , high - performance p-channel fieldeffect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

1. "PCE of 5.26%" is a Property Value entity, where PCE stands for power conversion efficiency.
2. "a high V oc of 0.91 V" is another Property Value entity, where V oc stands for open-circuit voltage.
3. "PCE of 4.0%" is a Property Value entity.
4. "a V oc of 0.69 V" is a Property Value entity.
5. "hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" is a Property Value entity.
6. "an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10" is a Property Value entity.

These entities represent the measured properties of the devices or materials being discussed in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "PCE of 5.26%"
2. "V oc of 0.91 V"
3. "PCE of 4.0%"
4. "V oc of 0.69 V"
5. "hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1"
6. "on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10"

These entities clearly refer to the values of material properties or device performance metrics. The other entities in the paragraph are either abbreviations for the property names or names of materials and devices, which are not relevant in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE of 5.26% |
| V oc of 0.91 V |
| PCE of 4.0% |
| V oc of 0.69 V |
| hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
| on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 |

The table lists the property values mentioned in the paragraph, with each value presented in a separate row. The values are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph, with no changes or abbreviations.
